column4: any possible problem with having both the ALSA and OSS mixers installed at the same time?
Not installed, but you're better off with aoss (alsa oss emulation)
Oss and Alsa don't mix. But Oss programs  can use aoss to play thru' the alsa system.
sigh....I'm about ready to give up on this
I've had some experience with audio.
the specific problem is getting audio out of mplayer
mm, what have you done so far?

I can watch, oh, a .wmv on my computer and it all works....then I go to www.imdb.com, click on a trailer I want to watch...the Cingular ad is fine, but when the trailer itself starts playing, I get no sound at all
doesn't matter if it's .wmv, Real, or quicktime....no sound
So sound in general is fine, just the movie off the internet?
I've tried .wmv, Real Video, and Quicktime.....no sound on any of it
Have you tried other players? Xine based? VLC?
I've found that sometimes other players do the job better with different formats.
'though these days mostly they're all pretty good.
well, since I'm lacking a better idea at present, I'll install VLC and see what happens
Another one to try is realplayer. it is available thru [just a sec] , mm looks like its disappeared from the repositories.
